snippet: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said that the blazes, which have burned many homes and forced residents to flee, were acts of “terror.”...
abstract: Israeli authorities arrest 22 people on suspicion of arson or incitement to arson as country continues to battle severe wildfires; Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu suggests fires were set as act of Palestinian terrorism.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said that the blazes, which have burned many homes and forced residents to flee, were acts of “terror.”

headline.main: Israel Arrests 22 Over Wildfires, as Arson Is Suspected
headline.print_headline: Israel Arrests 22 in Arson Case, Saying, ‘There Is a Price for Terror’
